name: sovendus-integration-tester
description: Sovendus integration tester chrome & firefox extensions

scripts.build: yarn run build-ts && yarn run copy-files
scripts.build-release: yarn run build-and-test --buildMode && yarn run zip-builds
scripts.build-ts: yarn run clean && tsc --build && rimraf build/chrome/tests
scripts.soft-build: tsc --build && rimraf build/chrome/tests && yarn run copy-files
scripts.build-and-test: yarn run build-test-zips && yarn run test
scripts.build-and-test-it: yarn run build-test-zips && yarn run test-it
scripts.build-test-zips: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run zip-builds-for-tests
scripts.copy-files: yarn run copy-other-files && yarn run copy-to-ff && yarn run copy-browser-specific-files
scripts.copy-other-files: cpy src/extension-pop-up/extension-pop-up.html build/chrome/extension-pop-up/ --flat && cpy src/npm/** build/chrome/npm/ && cpy src/sovendus.png build/chrome/ --flat
scripts.copy-browser-specific-files: cpy src/chrome/* build/chrome && cpy src/firefox/* build/firefox
scripts.zip-builds: zip-build build/chrome release_zips -t 'chrome-test-sovendus-integration_%VERSION%_%TIMESTAMP%.%EXT%' && zip-build build/firefox release_zips -t 'firefox-test-sovendus-integration_%VERSION%_%TIMESTAMP%.%EXT%'
scripts.zip-builds-for-tests: rimraf test_zips && zip-build build/chrome test_zips -t 'chrome-test-sovendus-integration_TESTING.crx' && zip-build build/firefox test_zips -t 'firefox-test-sovendus-integration_TESTING.xpi'

author: Marcus Brandstaetter - Sovendus GmbH
